name: Printer Description File
summary: Learn about .WPX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
Parallels Desktop for Mac with Windows installed

content: WPX files typically take up about 12K of disk space and are stored in the /WINDOWS or /WINDOWS/SYSTEM directory.

description: Printer information file that contains a description of the printer's features; may be referenced when printer jobs are created and sent to the printer; often installed with Windows PostScript printers.
